name: Asean Hostel Trung Hoa
address: Alley No.25, No.5, Nguyen Ngoc Vu, Trung Hoa Ward, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
If what you're looking for is a conveniently located hotel in Hanoi, look no further than Asean Hostel Trung Hoa. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At Asean Hostel Trung Hoa, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like luggage storage, car hire.

Step into one of 15 inviting rooms and escape the stresses of the day with a wide range of amenities such as towels, television, toiletries which can be found in some rooms. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Asean Hostel Trung Hoa is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
